oai_dc:dc.dc:description: |han=kass'o tells the story of the abuse of |gui-an (or Doortje) who was beaten by her mistress, Trina de Klerck and also by Trina's husband Jacob. Trina de Klerck had used a thong to beat |gui-an and her husband Jacob had beaten her with a heavy Bambush (bamboo) reed after which she fainted. After that beating |gui-an was unable to see properly.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: |gui-an (Dootje) and her mistress, Trina de Klerk
